[GOD 1 QUOTE]An immortal life spent focu.english: An immortal life spent focusing on the inner self, away from the distractions of material wealth.
[GOD 1 QUOTE]An immortal life spent focu.chinese: 专注于内在自我的不朽生命，远离物质财富的干扰。

[GOD 2 QUOTE]This sleazy spirit revels i.english: This sleazy spirit revels in the lust for quick easy gain and contempt for the value of steady work.
[GOD 2 QUOTE]This sleazy spirit revels i.chinese: 这位堕落的神灵陶醉于贪图快利和对稳定工作价值的蔑视。

[GOD 3 QUOTE]The embodiment of natural d.english: The embodiment of natural disasters. An impenetrable motive drives the devastation caused by this spirit.
[GOD 3 QUOTE]The embodiment of natural d.chinese: 自然灾害的体现。一种费解的动机推动了这位神灵所造成的破坏。

[GOD 4 QUOTE]This spirit knows about eve.english: This spirit knows about everything you'll ever do, and enjoys dispensing a harsh judgment.
[GOD 4 QUOTE]This spirit knows about eve.chinese: 这位神灵知道你将要做的每件事，并且喜欢做出严厉的判断。

[GOD 5 QUOTE]This is the spirit of merry.english: This is the spirit of merry getaways and regretful Monday mornings.
[GOD 5 QUOTE]This is the spirit of merry.chinese: 这就是快乐的出游之神和周一上午的懊悔之灵。

[GOD 6 QUOTE]All things that be and ever.english: All things that be and ever will be were scripted long ago by this spirit's inscrutable tendrils.
[GOD 6 QUOTE]All things that be and ever.chinese: 所有的事情都是很久以前由这个神灵的不可思议的卷须编写的。

[GOD 7 QUOTE]This spirit enjoys a good c.english: This spirit enjoys a good cheese after a day of hard work.
[GOD 7 QUOTE]This spirit enjoys a good c.chinese: 这位神灵最爱在一天的辛勤工作后享受美味的奶酪。

[GOD 8 QUOTE]While this spirit has many.english: While this spirit has many regrets, helping you rule the world through constant industrialization is not one of them.
[GOD 8 QUOTE]While this spirit has many.chinese: 虽然这位神灵有很多遗憾，但帮助你通过持续的工业化统治世界不是其中之一。

[GOD 9 QUOTE]A caring spirit said to con.english: A caring spirit said to contain itself, inwards infinitely.
[GOD 9 QUOTE]A caring spirit said to con.chinese: 一位满腹关怀神灵，据说它能无限地包容自己。

[GOD 10 QUOTE]This spirit enjoys poking.english: This spirit enjoys poking foul beasts and watching them squirm, but has no love for its own family.
[GOD 10 QUOTE]This spirit enjoys poking.chinese: 这位神灵喜欢鄙视肮脏的野兽，看它们无地自容。但他对自己的家庭没有毫无爱意。

[GOD 11 QUOTE]You will find that life ge.english: You will find that life gets just a little bit sweeter if you can motivate this spirit with tidy numbers and properly-filled tax returns.
[GOD 11 QUOTE]You will find that life ge.chinese: 如果你能恰当地使用工整的数字来填写纳税申报单，你会发现这位神灵会被你的行为所激励，因此你的生活也会变得更加甜蜜。

Selling buildings triggers a buff booste.english: Selling buildings triggers a buff boosted by how many buildings were sold.
Selling buildings triggers a buff booste.chinese: 出售建筑会触发一个增益状态，效果由售出建筑数量决定。

Buff boosts clicks by +%1% for every bui.english: Buff boosts clicks by +%1% for every building sold for %2 seconds.
Buff boosts clicks by +%1% for every bui.chinese: 每卖出一座建筑，就会获得 %2秒 的点击产量 +%1% 加成。

Wrinklers appear %1% faster and digest %.english: Wrinklers appear %1% faster and digest %2% more cookies.
Wrinklers appear %1% faster and digest %.chinese: 饼干虫出现速度加快 %1%，消化饼干的数量增加 %2%。

Buildings grant -%1% CpS..chinese: 所有建筑的 CpS 减少 %1%。

Each time you slot a spirit, you use up.english:
Each time you slot a spirit, you use up one worship swap.
If you have 2 swaps left, the next one will refill after %1.
If you have 1 swap left, the next one will refill after %2.
If you have 0 swaps left, you will get one after %3.
Unslotting a spirit costs no swaps.
Each time you slot a spirit, you use up.chinese:
每次把一个神灵拖到槽位上，就会消耗一次置换祈祷。
如果你剩下 2 次置换祈祷，补充一次需要 %1。
如果你剩下 1 次置换祈祷，补充一次需要 %1。
如果你剩下 0 次置换祈祷，获得一次需要 %3。
将一个神灵移出槽位不会消耗置换祈祷的次数。

Click to refill all your worship swaps f.english: Click to refill all your worship swaps for %1.
Click to refill all your worship swaps f.chinese: 点击消耗 %1 以补充所有的置换祈祷次数。

If a golden cookie is clicked, this spir.english: If a golden cookie is clicked, this spirit is unslotted and all worship swaps will be used up.
If a golden cookie is clicked, this spir.chinese: 如果点击了一个黄金饼干，这个神灵将被移出槽位，并且所有的置换祈祷都将被消耗。

Golden and wrath cookies appear %1% more.english: Golden and wrath cookies appear %1% more.
Golden and wrath cookies appear %1% more.chinese: 黄金和愤怒饼干出现几率增加 %1%。

Golden and wrath cookies appear %1% less.english: Golden and wrath cookies appear %1% less.
Golden and wrath cookies appear %1% less.chinese: 黄金和愤怒饼干出现几率减少 %1%。
